transcript:
Customer: Hello

Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Ji sir.
Executive: Sir, mai Janata Kendra se baat kar raha hu.
Customer: Ha, kaha se kar rahe ho Janata?
Executive: Janata Kendra se.
Customer: Ha ha sir bataiye.
Executive: Namaste sir apna.
Customer: Ji ji bataiye bataiye.
Executive: Mai sir aisa keh raha hu, ye jo IndiaMART hai, sahi hai? To mai matlab ek laptop hai mere bhai ka.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: To uske andar login karta hu to OTP kaun se number pe jata hai aap bata sakte ho? OTP sir ha mai abhi batata hu ruk jaiye. Ji. OTP aapka jo primary number hai us pe bata do. Aapka jo primary number hai wo hai 510. Us wale number pe aapka jayega.
Customer: Lekin sir wo number to mere andar hai to wo wo number pe bhi OTP nahi girta sir.
Executive: Us number pe OTP jata nahi hai?
Customer: Nahi jata.
Executive: To aapne ye try kiya dusra number wala dusra number ek aur hai 366 us pe gaya kabhi?
Customer: Wo number pe bhi nahi jata sir. 704397 wo number pe bhi nahi jata.
Executive: Ha ha.
Executive: Us pe OTP nahi jata. Ek second ruk jaiye aapka wo to nahi hai koi ticket wagera to. 10 naam OTP. Theek hai ek kaam kariye video meet pe aa jaiye. Mai aapko guide karwa deta hu aur ye bataiye usme messages full to nahi hai phone me? Messages wagera aate hai normally?
Customer: Sorry sir?
Executive: Normally message matlab jo 510 wala number hai us pe jaise koi aur messages to aate honge na mai ya aisa to nahi hai uska messages wala full ho gaya ho. ke jo lead manager ke jo message hai na wo aate hai. Ha. Mail ID pe aate honge na wo to.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ha to mail ID pe aa raha hai. Ek kaam karo aap video meet pe aao aapka aap ye aapse to meri baat hoti rehti hai mai Arun Kumar Yadav ji baat kar raha hu sir aapka account hai.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ji ji to aap ek kaam karo mai video meet pe ID ye jo ID hai na. Ha ha. Ye bhai ko deni hai aur mere dusri ID open karni hai to ye saala login uske liye. Okay okay chaliye theek hai aur sir ye bataiye ki call wagera bilkul matlab ek mahine se call wagera jo IndiaMART pe aa rahe hai wo utha nahi rahe ho aap?
Customer: Nahi wo call to utha hi rahe hai na kyu nahi utha rahe? 
Executive: 0% hai sir mai aapko dikhaunga aapke paas 30 din me matlab mahine bhar me aapke paas me paanch call aaye hai. Aur paanch me se ek bhi call nahi utha. 0% call ratio hai. Nahi call nahi utha matlab meri baat suniye isme kaisa hota hai agar mai namaz me hua ya kuch aisa business me hua kaam me hua packing me hua to kya mera phone silent rehta hai lekin dobara unko mai call kar deta hu unka number jo lead manager me girta hai na to mai waha se call kar leta hu sham ko do phone aaye the lekin lead manager se unko phone kar diye the.
Executive: Ab mai aapko ek cheez batata hu isme waise to aap jo kar rahe ho koi issue kar nahi hai chalo karna theek hai but dusri cheez ye hoti hai na aapka jo call response rate hota hai na ye IndiaMART pe capture hota hai matlab capture in the sense ki hum log alag alag parameters pe wo capture karte hai ki aapki profile pe agar koi banda dekhega bhi to use dikhta hai ki customer kitna call pick karte hai one go me. One go matlab inko call karo to ye ab matlab usme kitna effort dalte hai hai banda uthane wala kyuki bahut se customer aise hote hai to directly call karte hai nahi uthata to wo agle agle bande ko call laga ke ho sakta hai ki usse saman le le. Ab ye
Customer: To jaise mai aapke dukan pe chala aap nahi hue agar bilkul same time pe agar pados me koi dukan hai mai us pe gaya uske paas same saman hai mai usse le lunga. Hai na?
Executive: Ji sir. To ha ye dikkat kaha ho jati hai ki aapke paas opportunity ek aayi wo aapne miss kar di. Because one go me aapne call nahi uthaya. Sir kya hai mai thoda jyada kaam me rehta hu na sir to kya call receive nahi ho raha hai abhi jo mera meri baat suniye mera jo chota bhai hai na mera chota bhai wo business me nahi hai lekin wo sara din free rehta hai. Okay. Samajh rahe ho? To wo ha jo 366 wala number hai na sir ka. Ji. Ha unse ji ji ji.
Executive: Okay to aap ek kaam karo dekho maine aapko mail ID pe link bheja hai ek video meet ka aap aa jao connect ho jao mai aapka login karwa deta hu. Mail ID pe gaya hoga jis pe mail aate hai na sare aapko usi mail ID pe gaya hoga.


Executive: Receive hua aapko sir?
Executive: Receive ho gaya mail? Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer unable to login to IndiaMART account.

- OTP not received on registered numbers.

- Call ratio is 0%.



Resolution:

- Executive offered assistance via video meet.

- Executive shared video meet link on mail ID.

- Suggested adding brother's number for call receiving.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to join video meet.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- otp, login, buyleads, videomeet, call ratio
